review: This was a gift to my wife to complement her Kindle Fire and her laptop.  When at a hotel, she plugs it into the TV in her room and can "throw" her screen or media content to the TV.  She is not technically savvy in anything electronics or computers, so for her to figure this out, configure the devices, and make it work on her own shows that this little device is great for streaming where TV is limited, or you just want to watch movies or play games.
